Package com.cafean.client.ui.beans

Class BeanPropDescriptionPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • com.cafean.client.ui.beans.BeanPropDescriptionPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    public class BeanPropDescriptionPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    A panel for use in a JPopupMenu for showing a description.

    This panel supports including the title in the description by surrounding it in square brackets ([) and (]) and ensuring that the left square bracket is the beginning of the string. Titles specified in this manner are removed from the description before
    For example: "[My Title] My description..."

    This panel supports image tags in the given description that are denoted by: <%image:path/to/image.png%>

    This panel supports document reference link tags in the given description that are denoted by: <%doclink:Link Name%>Link Text</%doclink%>

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • showPopup

        public static void showPopup​(java.awt.Component parent,
                             java.lang.String defTitle,
                             java.lang.String description)
        Creates a new bean property description panel and pops it up in a pop-up menu or pop-up window.
        Parameters:
        parent - a Component reference to the parent that will be used for the pop-up
        defTitle - a String containing the default title of the panel
        description - the String that will be used as the content of the displayed panel
        See Also:
        BeanPropDescriptionPanel(String, String, JPopupMenu)
